title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 913/84 of 3 April 1984 applying quality class III to certain fruit for the 1984/85 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 913/84
of 3 April 1984
applying quality class III to certain fruit for the 1984/85 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: A quality class III, as defined in the common quality standards, shall apply, for the period specified in each case, in respect of the products listed in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 April 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 118, 20. 5. 1972, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 198, 21. 7. 1983, p. 2.
(3) OJ No 233, 20. 12. 1966, p. 3939/66.
(4) OJ No L 157, 28. 6. 1969, p. 1.
(5) OJ No L 45, 24. 2. 1971, p. 1.
(6) OJ No L 172, 31. 7. 1971, p. 1.
(7) OJ No L 202, 26. 7. 1983, p. 28.
(8) OJ No L 360, 21. 12. 1982, p. 2.
ANNEX
1.2 // Table grapes:  // from 1 May 1984 to 30 April 1985  // Cherries:  // from 1 April to 30 September 1984  // Strawberries:  // from 1 April to 31 December 1984
